DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : Hypertensive disorder pregnancy important issue global public health . It current lead cause maternal mortality Brazil . Objective : To assess effect physical exercise use stationary bicycle blood pressure heart rate measurement , incidence pre-eclampsia quality life survey pregnant woman chronic high blood pressure , previous preeclampsia pregnancy factor associate compare group intervention . Verify type birth , maternal perinatal outcomes group . Methodology : This randomized clinical trial enrol pregnant woman present chronic hih blood pressure , previous pre-eclampsia experience . Women 12 20 gestational week select prenatal outpatient clinic randomly allocate study non-interventional group . Women study group perform physical exercise use stationary bicycle ( horizontal bench model ) 20 minute , week . The heart rate maintain 20 % rest heart rate 140 bpm . Blood pressure heart rate measurement evaluate exercise . The non-intervention group follow regular prenatal routine weekly return heart rate blood pressure measurement . Both group fulfil quality life survey ( SF-36 questionnaire ) three time : 12 20 week ; 28 32 week 36 41 week gestation . After data parturition analyze compare incidence pre-eclampsia , type birth , maternal perinatal outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Assessment Physical Exercise Using Stationary Bicycle Pregnant Women With Risk Preeclampsia Development
DOC.criteria: pregnant 12 20 week gestational chronic blood pressure , previous preeclampsia able perform exercise multiple pregnancy Systemic lupus erythematosus heart disease neurological disease renal failure persistent vaginal bleeding isthmiccervical insufficiency
